# nscale_file_storage_class (Data Source)

Nscale File Storage Class



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) An unique identifier for the file storage class.
- `region_id` (String) The identifier of the region where the file storage class is available.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the file storage class.
- `name` (String) The name of the file storage class.
- `protocols` (List of String) A list of protocols supported by the file storage class.
